propDescriptions.autoFocus: If true, the list item is focused during the first mount. Focus will also be triggered if the value changes from false to true.
propDescriptions.classes: Sobrescreve ou extende os estilos aplicados para o componente. Veja a API CSS abaixo para maiores detalhes.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.dense: If true, compact vertical padding designed for keyboard and mouse input is used. The prop defaults to the value inherited from the parent Menu component.
propDescriptions.disableGutters: If true, the left and right padding is removed.
propDescriptions.divider: Se true, uma borda clara de 1px será adicionada à parte inferior do item do menu.
propDescriptions.focusVisibleClassName: This prop can help identify which element has keyboard focus. The class name will be applied when the element gains the focus through keyboard interaction. It's a polyfill for the CSS :focus-visible selector. The rationale for using this feature is explained here. A polyfill can be used to apply a focus-visible class to other components if needed.
propDescriptions.sx: A propriedade do sistema que permite definir as suas substituições, assim como estilos CSS adicionais. Veja a `sx` page para mais detalhes.

gutters.description: Estilos aplicados em {{nodeName}} a menos que {{conditions}}.
